name: Simply Bingo
description:
This is a great app for Family Bingo Nights, or Social Bingo.  You can use this app to setup a Bingo Caller and then have players connect to it via the local network.

You can play either 75 or 90 card bingo, the Bingo Caller can select what type before they create the game.  When the bingo caller draws the ball it gets passed to the players and they have to click on their card to daub the number.

If the player gets a line they can press the 'Bingo' button, and then the Caller can decide to end the game or carry on.

If the player gets a full card the server can tell all the players who has won and the game ends.

Bingo Lingo also appears on the screen as the ball is called so you can have fun reading it.

Also as well as the Bingo App you can use this app just for a random number generator ( single player ) and it has various settings, you can choose from balls 0-99.

- Colour full graphics
- Easy interface
- Various settings
- 75 or 90 Bingo Cards
- Random Number Generator
- Multiplayer
- Bingo Caller
